pkgmetadata.longdescription: Access Data Dependencies Installed Through 'Biobricks.ai' // Provides an integrated data management solution for assets installed via the 'Biobricks.ai' platform. Streamlines the process of loading and interacting with diverse datasets in a consistent manner. A list of bricks is available at https://status.biobricks.ai. Documentation for 'Biobricks.ai' is available at https://docs.biobricks.ai.
